msbt.message: Hey, remember how I was thinking about moving to another island? Yeah, that's not happening. I ran into and got some really good advice. Helped me take a step back and think. After all, and just go together.Like and , I always say

Got an update on the whole " moving to a new island" situation Canceled! I ended up talking to and they convinced me to stay. So, go give 'em a high five, because they just hooked you up with a lot more .

Hey, remember how we talked about how I was thinking of moving away from ? Well, I also went and talked to , and got some really good advice. Long story shortâ€”I'm staying put! I'll be a part of the rich tapestry of for a while yet!

Sorry to swerve on you like this, but remember how we talked about me moving? Delete that! I just feel like I still haven't had the full experience, you know? Looking forward to making a whole bunch of new memories here with you, !
